review.comment: My bathroom pipe leakage had always been unkind to me. So, I call these guys, and turns out that the old plumber had only been making band-aid repairs. These guys were diagnosed and went to the root problem. They explained what needed to be done, fixed the issue and I’ve been happy with my bathroom for over a year now.

They have some really great options in mini-splits. But the best part is that they guide you well if you are a first-time mini split user. Trust me, they go to great lengths to make you well-acquainted with the AC and it is an option for you. Thanks, Home Mechanics.

Really nice and friendly team. I hired them to fix my home’s heating system. Not only did they do it in the committed time-frame and budget, they also took the time to explain everything to me. I’d hire them again in a heartbeat.

I really doubted mini splits as an option until I met these guys. I had no idea that a mini split could work so well for my office. These guys gave me some great options and installed it just fine with minimal disturbance. It seems to be going without a squeak.

They really saved me from what could have been a tragedy. I had no idea that the wiring in my new apartment was in such bad shape. One spark and I called them for an emergency repair. They guided me through what I needed to do before they could arrive. I think they averted a major fire and possible injury. Thanks guys.
Home Mechanics have been my go-to guys for home repairs for more than a year now. They do some serious repair work. Absolutely impressive professionalism.
To be honest, I took it very casually when they said they’ll clean up after the job is done. But boy! They clean up real good. No mess. No floor or wall damage.
Ethical practice. Skilled guys. And the best part, no hidden fees. I am sticking with them for good.
These guys are life savers. I have never seen any service provider, whatsoever, turn up so fast. And they don’t charge you an arm and a leg for it. Totally recommended.

I’ve hired them a couple of times for different repairs now. Their work is up to satisfaction and...their initial price estimate is never too far behind the final invoice. This is clean dealing. I like it very much.

I hired Home Mechanics to install a ductless mini split system. I wanted more heat in a couple of rooms and really wanted AC as well.

Noel, the owner, came out to do the estimate. He was very friendly and explained everything to me thoroughly, which is super helpful because I was pretty clueless. Two weeks after we signed the contract, he came back with a crew and installed it in just one day! The system is even better than I expected! And it's quiet, which was one of my original concerns. Overall a great experience with these guys.
review.review_reply: Thanks so much Grace! It was a pleasure to work with you. Glad to hear the new system is working out well.

review.comment: Fantastic experience with Home Mechanics. Noel and his crew were on time, professional, and did great work. They quickly changed out or furnace with a new high efficiency one. Job was completed in just two days. They came back within an hour a couple of days after the system had been functioning to make a small adjustment. A+ company.
review.review_reply: Thank you Marissa! It was great to work with you.
